name: Tanya Dunleavy
text: I normally order from Stuthers but I'm working in Poland so had no choice. I ordered the Honey BBQ sandwich and Supremo sandwich. The bbq had no ranch and barely any bbq sauce and the lettuce looked like it came from the salad bar. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Corey M
text: Because they are lost but never forgotten. I now have nothing but respect for this branch. Thank you Pizza Hut for honoring our fallen men and women of our armed forces. I'm feel very grateful for this establishment.

name: Darrell Longwell
text: AMAZBALLS!!! Lauren and Dave were the personnel i dealt with and I've never had a better experience!!! The pan crust was amazing crispy and light...the sauce was spiced right holding up the toppings full bodied and toppings were in every bite...the PERFECT PIZZA. THANK YOU PIZZA HUT!!!

name: trudi summers
text: It was ok.  They got the crust coating messed up.  But it was good otherwise

name: Karen Lawrence

text: The food was excellent the service was 5 star will go back

name: Lisa Mercer
text: Salad bar had wilted lettuce and needed replenished with toppings and dressing. Carpet was extremely sticky in places. Staff seemed unsure of orders. Other than that, we've been here before and never had a complaint. Was disappointed and hope for better next time.

name: Kaleb Sepe
text: Very good service everyone is very polite. The food is really good the pizza is good just a bit greedy but nothing unexpected. A great place to stop and eat.

text: No staff so no table service neither did they have salad and pasta bar do to no staff

name: Abby B
text: Beware of overcharging!!  Twice in a row now I've been overcharged by a couple dollars.  When I asked them about why the charges were so high, they quickly apologized, then gave me back too much money with no explanation.  Seems pretty shady.  I won't be back to this store.

name: Robinette Dawson
text: The worst I ordered a delivery order pizza was burned on the edges and my chicken barely had any sauce there was sauce only in the bottom of the container.  It was just horrible.

text: Had the Wednesday buffet. It was horrible. Service was non existent. Everyone in the back of the kitchen was just standing there doing nothing to help out.  No manager. Several tables left due to nothing on the buffet.  No refills till we asked. No clean plates. A absolutely terrible visit!!! Definitely not recommended at all!!!

name: Michael Witt
text: I love this Pizza Hut! It's locally owned and has a great local sports decor inside. We go for the buffet which is a great value for a family. I think I want pizza now that I'm writing this...hmm...Pizza. The have beer too, if you want it, and a salad bar, which is included in the price of their buffet.

name: Crystal Lillard
text: Will never order from this place again. Poor customer service. Took order and then an hour and 20 minutes later says they have no record of the order even though it shows on the credit card for the order. Was told to call corporate.  Poor management.

name: Suzie Mead
text: The waitresses are very helpful.  They usually help me with different kinds of pizza because I can't eat red sauce.The atmosphere is usually friendly and quiet.

name: Cat Marie
text: Rude employees, couldn't answer the phone after calling 9 times about missing food I paid for. Then once answered got hung up on.

text: Friendly staff and good üçï. Not a fan of when Pizza Hut shifted from napkins to a roll of paper towels at the table, but that isn't enough to ding the chain or the store.  More expensive than some other chains, like Little Caesars, but the food and atmosphere is much better.
